mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS articles ( id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , title TEXT NOT NULL , content LONGTEXT NOT NULL , category INT(11) NOT NULL , itemnumber TEXT NOT NULL , price FLOAT NOT NULL , date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , comments TINYINT(1) NOT NULL , visible TINYINT(1) NOT NULL , isContent TINYINT(1) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE = MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS articlesComments ( id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , articleid INT(11) NOT NULL , userid INT(11) NOT NULL , title TEXT NOT NULL , content LONGTEXT NOT NULL , date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , visible TINYINT(1) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE = MyISAM DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS articlesProperties ( id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , property INT(11) NOT NULL , price FLOAT NOT NULL , quantity INT(11) NOT NULL , articleid INT(11) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE = MyISAM DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS categories ( id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , catid INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , title TEXT NOT NULL , description LONGTEXT NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE = MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT = 2 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , level TINYINT(4) NOT NULL , email TEXT NOT NULL , password VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , birthdate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , prename VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL , surname VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL , street VARCHAR(70) NOT NULL , streetNumber INT(5) NOT NULL , place TEXT NOT NULL , country TEXT NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE = MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT = 2 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS properties ( id INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , pname TEXT NOT NULL , category INT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
